short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start screen recording with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Great novelty for screen recording and screenshot recording. This is Screen Recorder. Quickly and clearly you can save the information you need on the screen by taking a screenshot thanks to Screen Recorder. Now you do not need to search for a long time how to record a screen. You install our product with one click of the mouse and it will do everything for you. Screen Recorder is completely free. Easy to use, has a clear interface. Also, the extension is multifunctional. You can speed up the process of recording high quality video. Therefore, rather install Screen Recorder and we are sure that this is exactly what you need.
